description.title: Private sale new token project launch

feature.title: FEATURES
feature.subtitle: Global network aims to revolutionize the market of network marketing by decentralized millions of users to web3 application. Every application and utility will be build upon decentralized network marketing referral contract. Get royalty from referral sales up to 100 levels.

fullTransparency.title: Full Transparency
fullTransparency.subtitle: Anyone can view the entire transaction history at any time. This ensures fair conditions and reliable statistics that you can rely on

fullAutomation.title: Full Automation
fullAutomation.subtitle: All transactions take place directly from personal wallet to smart contract. Participants do all transaction directly to smart contract and processing automatically through smart contract

smartContract.title: Smart Contract
smartContract.subtitle: Global Network ecosystem is built around the technology of smart contracts and NFTs, which are completely autonomous and exclude the influence of the human factor.

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.subtitle: All data is stored in the blockchain in the public domain and can be verified!

matchingBonus.title:
100 Level
Matching bonus
matchingBonus.description: Get matching up to 100 levels for any project issued by the decentralized global network marketing team

populationSection.title: Global Decentralized Network Marketing
populationSection.content: Only 1% of the 7.96 billion people on earth own a cryptocurrency wallet. We are still in the early stages of this market, but as most people now own smartphones, they have the potential to own a crypto wallet and cryptocurrencies.You can earn passive income by building a network marketing DeFi platform with the Global Network. All products built will be sold through the Global Network DeFi. This includes NFT farming, share-to-earn, royalty properties, crypto cafes, metaverse projects, and more.Join us to access the world's best community referral program for all things crypto, DeFi, metaverse, and blockchain related and start earning profits.

project.title: Project
project.description: All applications and utilities will be built on a decentralized network platform
